Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2013 12:49PM adviceplease wrote: I know lily55! But what should i do now? I have had all the imaging possible which show nothing. I could push for a biopsy but as there is no area to aim for it could be a false negative anyway right? Thanks for your concern x
Posts.Title: Any ideas if not BC? adviceplease adviceplease

Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2013 12:32PM adviceplease wrote: Thanks for responding. Yes I have been told to cut out caffeine and take evening primrose oil. My symptoms are so constant, not related to cycle, and do not change if i am happy/sad etc. I am trying to believe that it is not cancer as i have had all the imaging, and have no clinical presentation... but it must be SOMETHING! Obviously it's hard for the doctors to diagnose as its just based on things i am "feeling" and nothing that they can see or feel. i had to push for all tests so far(and pay for them myself) as the doctor said i didnt need any tests. But to have abnormal sensations in your body for months is very stressful and draining. I know no one on here can diagnose me, but just need to get my feelings out a bit! Thanks for listening!
Posts.Title: Any ideas if not BC? adviceplease adviceplease
